home.title: REBUILD
home.keywords: REBUILD, RB, CRM, OA, business, systems, offical
home.introduction: REBUILD (RB) provides you with a basic platform for business data management and analysis, permissions and processes, data auditing, and message notification. It can easily design a more suitable business system based on the different needs of the enterprise.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.desc: The source code of REBUILD is completely open, you can modify it under the GPL3.0 license

selfdesign.title: Freely Design
selfdesign.desc: You can design your own business system according to the needs of enterprise processes

vpteam.title: VP Team
vpteam.desc: We have more than 10 years of experience in enterprise product development

yourneed.title: What do you need
yourneed.desc: In the selection of products, it is often brought to the forefront by a large number of candidates on the market. How to choose?
yourneed.desc2: In addition to meeting the daily business needs, system scalability, flexibility, stability and performance are also important indicators. REBUILD achieves "self-evolution" with powerful customization capabilities to meet the growing business needs of the enterprise. Industry-leading system test coverage indicators ensure system stability and performance.

letimplemented.title: Let informatization implemented
letimplemented.desc: In many cases, informatization does not work well within the company. In addition to the company's own determination and execution, the implementation process and product usability are also crucial.
letimplemented.desc2: "Three-point software, seven-point implementation" can see the importance of the implementation process for the final product. With more than 10 years of industry experience, the REBUILD team is able to create products that are easier to use, easier to use, and compliant with business processes, so that employees love and use them to make information technology truly come true.

feature.title: Features
feature.subtitle: REBUILD has powerful features to meet the daily business needs of the company. While maintaining constant iterations of updates, new features are introduced to optimize existing features.

entity.title: Custom Entity
entity.desc: Quickly design to the business changes

auditing.title: Data Audit
auditing.desc: Track data history, not afraid of any data leaks

analytics.title: Analysis
analytics.desc: Rich analysis charts, business data at a glance

migration.title: Data Import
migration.desc: Historical business data, free to import

freely.title: Open Source
freely.desc: Get the latest source code at any time

buylicense.title: Get started
buylicense.desc: REBUILD is an open source product that uses the GPL 3.0 license agreement and any modifications/distributions you must follow. For commercial use, please purchase a REBUILD commercial license.

license.moreSupport: We also offer OEM/SaaS licenses. Please
